message.functionality.phantom_treat.star: %s enjoyed the treat. It wants more!
message.functionality.phantom_treat.rand: %s stares at you hungry for more treats.
message.functionality.phantom_treat.last: %s has reached peak form. It's swift as the wind now.
message.functionality.phantom_treat.too_: %s is tired of the treat. It won't accept more.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.fish_trap:
Place to increase luck:
 • Amethyst crystals
 • Gold blocks
 • Mob heads
Works within 5 blocks (2 of each for max luck).
Higher light level speeds it up.
Water depth increases catch amount.
tooltip.functionality.lichen: A hybrid colony of algae and fungus.
tooltip.functionality.bloom_lichen: A lichen adapted to dark environments.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.chunk_loa:
• Right click - configure radius.
 • Sneak + Right click - Toggle radius rendering.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.repair_al:
• Use amethyst shard to activate it.
 • Extracts ancient experience from copper.
 • Can store copper blocks inside.
 • Can only repair items.
tooltip.functionality.chevon: Has earthy scent and firm texture.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_chevon:
It's very chewy.
Has jump-boosting capabilities.
tooltip.functionality.sniffon: It has a herbal, old smell.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_sniffon: An ancient treat with healthy properties.
tooltip.functionality.gilded_sniffon: Even healthier than its plain variant.
tooltip.functionality.frog_leg: Looks disgusting and smells like swamp.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin: Stinks of mud and might be poisonous.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin_soup:
Smells delicious.
Perfect for underwater travels.
tooltip.functionality.fins: They make you swim much faster!
tooltip.functionality.obsidian_fins: They make you swim in lava!
tooltip.detailed.functionality.obsidian_: You might want to be fire resistant for that.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.inferno_g: Also makes you see clearly in lava.
tooltip.functionality.whispering_herb: Everything in its presence becomes silent.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.phantom_h: Causes phantoms to not spawn as if you just rested.
tooltip.functionality.chorus_herb: A strange plant that moves on its own.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.chorus_he: Teleports you to your spawn point.
tooltip.functionality.crimson_herb: It radiates a strong, disturbing aura.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.crimson_h: Grants immunity to poison and wither effects.
tooltip.functionality.glow_herb: Its leaves are warm and softly glowing.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.glow_herb:
Grants immunity to:
 • Void damage
 • Levitation
 • Angering Endermen

Taking void damage rapidly corrupts you.
It can only be cured with regeneration effect.
tooltip.functionality.glow_torch: Works underwater and is unaffected by moving liquids.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.harpoon:
• Tripled reach underwater.
 • Attracts mob drops underwater.
 • Restores air on kill.
 • Quite fragile, but highly enchantable.
tooltip.functionality.bident: A masterwork weapon of the deep.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.bident:
• Has all abilities like the harpoon.
 • Gives more air per kill.
 • Also works when it's raining.
tooltip.functionality.pheromones: A universal tame mixture for animals.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.pheromone: Right click on any tamable mob to make it your friend!
tooltip.functionality.phantom_treat: Feed it to any animal to make it much faster.
tooltip.functionality.vex_essence: A material of pure, yet chaotic knowledge.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.ancient_s:
Right click to start searching.
Consumes experience levels.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.nautilus_: Sneak + Right click - Toggle liquid placing mode.
information.functionality.treasure_sacks: Over-harvesting treasure sacks empties them in the area. Wait a few days to refill.
information.functionality.infernal_sacks: Over-harvesting infernal sacks empties them in the area. Wait a few days to refill.
information.functionality.infinite_water: Place any of the listed blocks below a cauldron to make it an infinite water source.
information.functionality.night_vision_p: Use an empty bottle on a glow squid to get a night vision potion. It might hurt!
information.functionality.throwable_disc: Music discs are throwable. Gotta catch em all!
information.functionality.thunder_ritual: Drop the item on copper block surrounded by torches to start a thunderstorm.
information.functionality.haste_harvesti: Use an empty bottle on a bloom lichen to get a haste potion. Harvest more to increase duration.
information.functionality.repair_altar: Use copper blocks in the altar to repair items without experience cost.
